transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Haa boliye.
Uh Truman se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Haa boliye.
Uh sir mera naam Komal hai, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu aapse.
Haa boliye. Sir basically aap IndiaMART ki services apni jo hai kaafi time se use nahi kar rahe hain. Bilkul bhi active nahi hai and buyleads vagera bhi consume nahi kar rahe hain. To koi problem aap face kar rahe hain?
Wo abhi starting mein maine kiya tha matlab regularly.
Hanji.
Wo matlab wo response nahi aa raha hai matlab buyers aane pe.
Response nahi aa raha hai. Sir response basically sir jaise aapne mujhe bataya ki aapko response vagera nahi aa raha hai. To aapko jo direct queries vagera aati hain aap unhe check karte hain?
Kya bol rahe ho?
Aapko jo direct inquiry aati hai aap unhe check karte hain?
Haa, haa check karta hu.
Jaise aapki kal bhi aapko ek matlab 31st October ko aapko aayi hui thi. Mumbai se aayi thi ki unko men brown leather wale boots chahiye the. To aapki inse baat hui thi to kya matlab kya raha tha inka?
Unko maine call kiya tha aur WhatsApp pe message kiya tha magar phir unka kuch reply nahi aaya.
Achha unka kuch reply nahi aaya. Aur isse pehle aapko ek bulk order ke liye wo aaya tha 17 tarikh ko aayi thi aapko ki unko 80 pairs chahiye the loafers ke. To ye call thi matlab ye jo inquiry thi.
Nahi unko 80 pairs nahi chahiye the unko sirf ek hi pair chahiye tha unko bhi matlab rate samajh nahi aaya.
To basically aap price ka issue ho gaya tha.
Hmm. Wo unhone matlab wo dekha hoga matlab aise hi daal diya hoga quantity. Magar wo the single piece ke customer. To koi baat nahi mere ko to single piece ke customer bhi chalte hain magar unko rate samajh mein nahi aaya.
To basically waha pe agar hum keh sakte hain ki waha pe price ka issue aaya tha waise theek tha wo right?
Hmm.
Aur usse pehle aapko ek 27 September ko aayi hui thi ye bhi 100 pair wali thi inse aapki baat hui thi? Matlab inhone to bola bhi tha ki inko WhatsApp pe hi product vagera pehle bhejne hain. Drop all your products to WhatsApp.

To inse kya issue raha tha aapka?
Wo sare matlab kaise aate hain baat cheet vagera karte hain magar koi leta nahi hai sir.
Achha matlab baat cheet karte hain but conversion aapse nahi aapka nahi ho paya hai ki unko kharidna matlab last se bolte hain.
Hmm unko matlab wo time pass bolte hain na.
Haa.
Most of wahi hota hai aise koi serious buyer abhi tak mila nahi.
Sirf ek hi tha.
Hanji. Ko diya tha.
Ek ek aapko mila hai?
Hmm.
Achha to jaise dekhiye sir aapne jo aapki jo services start hui thi wo September mein hui thi right? To abhi September se October aur October se November abhi iska matlab second month hai aapka right? To sir jaise aap apni shop vagera jab open karte ho to usme thoda sa time to lagta hai na matlab usko settle hone mein customer aap tak aaye right? To thoda aapko pehle thodi jyada mehnat karni padti hai.
Right? So basically hamara IndiaMART pe bhi yahi hai aap onboard hue ho aap September mein aaye ho to aap thoda sa isme active rahiye aapko jaise jaise aap buyleads vagera consume karoge na waise waise aapki listing upar aayegi. Waise waise aapki visibility increase hogi theek hai? To jab aap aap dikhne lagoge na aap buyleads vagera consume karoge to logo ko aap dikhne lagoge. To waha se kya hoga na aapko direct inquiries bhi jyada aayengi aur jo jaise hamara jo buyleads wala section hai na wo bhi aapke according buyleads dene lagega. Jaise aapko chahiye particular aap kaun si location mein deal karna chahte hain?
Koi bhi chalega India level pe.
Achha matlab overall India aapko sari locations chalengi right?
Hmm chalegi.
Achha to jaise aap mujhe bata rahe ho na to basically main aapko yahi advise karungi sabse pehle to aap na pehle thoda active rahiye buyleads vagera consume kariye apne area ki ya matlab jaha ki bhi aapko suitable lage. Pehle aap thoda buyleads consume kariye visibility increase kariye apni matlab apna matlab ek hota hai na maintain kariye aap uske baad aapko business milega thoda sa time to dekhiye lagta hi hai. Wo sab kiya hi hu wo sab kiya hi hu sir starting mein pehle one month maine kiya hi hu daily sab cheez regular.
Sir dekhiye sahi batau to one month mein agar aap bolo maine one month kara tha nahi mila mujhe to ab main nahi karunga dekho ab aapne investment kari hai right? Investment kari hai to ye rehta hai ki ab maine investment kari to mujhe waha se apna nikalna hai. Matlab mujhe business lena hai. Theek hai profit chahiye mujhe. To thoda sa aapko mehnat karni padegi thoda sa aap matlab pure din mein do baar ek baar online aaye uske baad buyleads ko dekhe koi bhi jo bhi suitable lage ek baar usko consume kare baat kare usse. Hmm. Theek hai? Matlab thoda sa agar aap karenge na to aapko business aane lagega. Hmm. Hmm.
Hanji. Uh agar abhi aap chahe to abhi bhi apne matlab IndiaMART ki app ko open karke.
Kyunki abhi bhi isme jo hai na buyleads aayi hui hain. Agar aapko particular Gujarat ki chahiye to Gujarat ki bhi hai aur all all over India ki chahiye to all over India ki bhi hai.
Band kiya hai maine.
Hello.
Hello.
Haa.
Haa sir main ye keh rahi hu ek baar aap apni IndiaMART ke app open karna aur usme buyleads aa rakhi hogi unko consume karna. Jaise Gujarat se aayi hui hai aapki men boot with box and leather high ankle men boots ye Ahmedabad se aayi hui hai. Aur men leather boots ye sari ki sari aapke liye aayi hui hain.
Hmm.
Aur agar all India karna hai to all India se bhi kaafi sari buyleads aayi hui hain. Sports sole loafer chahiye ye Punjab se hai. Aur ye matlab loafers ke liye aayi hui hain shoes ke liye aayi hui hain boots ke liye aayi hui hain.
Hmm.
To aap ek baar apni app open karke unko consume kariye please. Theek hai theek hai. Theek hai? Okay. Aur koi issue?
Bas aur koi nahi. Phir agar kuch aisa hoga to aapko bataunga theek hai. Theek hai main aapko na shaam ko ek baar call karti hu ki aapko buyleads resume matlab proper mili ya nahi mili theek hai? Okay okay. Okay thank you. Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper response.

- Customer mentioned about price issue.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to stay active on IndiaMART.

- Executive suggested to consume buyleads regularly.

- Executive explained benefits of consuming buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call in the evening for buyleads update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, visibility, inquiries
